column4: When I run wget with the -r option, it recurses *upwards* and retrieves files until everyone under the base URL has been retrieved. How do I prevent this? I only want to recurse "downwards."
btw my tree is upside down so the root is "up" and the branches are "down" lol
Actually, in filesystems the root is always "up"
it depends on how you think about it but yet... that's what i mean the root is the top of the tree
